CodeEditorModel.Text:
'IAG Code behind - Add local subroutines for the IAG.
'Declaration of the variables Private Dim PosXInc As Double 'Actual value of the movement
Sub OnFunction 'Subroutine to move the images Dim ct As Int16 = 0
'Initialisation of variables PosXInc = Me.Valve_Pos1.Left
If MyPneuBloc.Enabled(1) Then Me.Valve_Pos1.Left=PosXInc PosXInc+=50 End If
If MyPneuBloc.Enabled(2) Then Me.Valve_Pos2.Left=PosXInc PosXInc+=50 End If
If MyPneuBloc.Enabled(3) Then Me.Valve_Pos3.Left=PosXInc PosXInc+=50 End If
If MyPneuBloc.Enabled(4) Then Me.Valve_Pos4.Left=PosXInc PosXInc+=50 End If
If MyPneuBloc.Enabled(5) Then Me.Valve_Pos5.Left=PosXInc PosXInc+=50 End If
If MyPneuBloc.Enabled(6) Then Me.Valve_Pos6.Left=PosXInc PosXInc+=50 End If
If MyPneuBloc.Enabled(7) Then Me.Valve_Pos7.Left=PosXInc PosXInc+=50 End If
If MyPneuBloc.Enabled(8) Then Me.Valve_Pos8.Left=PosXInc PosXInc+=50 End If
If MyPneuBloc.Enabled(9) Then Me.Valve_Pos9.Left=PosXInc PosXInc+=50 End If
If MyPneuBloc.Enabled(10) Then Me.Valve_Pos10.Left=PosXInc PosXInc+=50 End If
If MyPneuBloc.Enabled(11) Then Me.Valve_Pos11.Left=PosXInc PosXInc+=50 End If
If MyPneuBloc.Enabled(12) Then Me.Valve_Pos12.Left=PosXInc PosXInc+=50 End If
If MyPneuBloc.Enabled(13) Then Me.Valve_Pos13.Left=PosXInc PosXInc+=50 End If
If MyPneuBloc.Enabled(14) Then Me.Valve_Pos14.Left=PosXInc PosXInc+=50 End If
If MyPneuBloc.Enabled(15) Then Me.Valve_Pos15.Left=PosXInc PosXInc+=50 End If
If MyPneuBloc.Enabled(16) Then Me.Valve_Pos16.Left=PosXInc PosXInc+=50 End If
Me.Alimentation.Left=PosXInc
Me.R_FormingBackground.Width=PosXInc+Me.Rectangle1.Width+10
End Sub
